text: @realDonaldTrump Their impeachment plan failed. So plan B: hype Coronavirus and trigger financial collapse just in time for the election. If the dems win, the 1st thing they will do is adopt the French accord. Then most Americans won't be able to afford to heat their homes despite low oil prices.
